name: vridniX
description: vridniX is a story-driven platformer. Control a small creature who wants to save the world but will destroy it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual Core or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
